>The movie The Last Samurai... is it=
 a real part of history or not?

The movie itself is, yes. It was released =
in 2003 and as such, is now part of our history.

The events in the movie? =
No. Some of the characters and events are VERY LOOSELY based on real histor=
y, but 99% of it is Holywood fantasy. Read the book 'The Last Samurai: The =
Life and Battles of Saigo Takamori' by Mark Ravina for the real history beh=
ind the character Katsumoto was based on.

-AngusH
